mapper.select: SELECT m.id AS management_time_id, m.value AS management_time_value, c.id AS category_management_time_id, c.value AS category_management_time_value, t.id AS todo_management_time_id, t.day AS todo_management_time_day, t.target AS todo_management_time_target, t.performance AS todo_management_time_performance, t.user_id AS todo_management_time_user_id, u.fullname AS user_fullname FROM management_time m LEFT JOIN category_management_time c on m.id = c.management_time_id LEFT JOIN todo_management_time t on c.id = t.category_management_time_id LEFT JOIN user u on t.user_id = u.id UNION SELECT m.id AS management_time_id, m.value AS management_time_value, null AS category_management_time_id, null AS category_management_time_value, t.id AS todo_management_time_id, t.day AS todo_management_time_day, t.target AS todo_management_time_target, t.performance AS todo_management_time_performance, t.user_id AS todo_management_time_user_id, u.fullname AS user_fullname FROM management_time m LEFT JOIN todo_management_time t on m.id = t.management_time_id LEFT JOIN user u on t.user_id = u.id
